title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1385/1999 of 28 June 1999 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2999/92 laying down detailed rules for the application of the specific measures for the supply of processed fruit and vegetables to Madeira and to determine the forecast supply balance for the period 1 July 1999 to 30 June 2000
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1385/1999
of 28 June 1999
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2999/92 laying down detailed rules for the application of the specific measures for the supply of processed fruit and vegetables to Madeira and to determine the forecast supply balance for the period 1 July 1999 to 30 June 2000
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2999/92 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 June 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
